channel.title: A weird IP problem
channel.description:
Well i can connect to my server perfectly fine using 127.0.0.1, but i cant connect to it using my real IP, and neither clan my friends.it says Error connecting to server etc..
Any idea, any help is appreciated? :|

item.title: A weird IP problem
item.dc:creator: @Bevis Bevis
item.description:
@Bevis wrote:

you said you turned off firewalls, did you forward 43594 on your router??(if you have one)

Read full topic

item.title: A weird IP problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

b3nyboy:

have u made a server ip at no-ip.com?

That dosent make the slightest bit of difference you know =\

[quote]You can connect to your server because it’s localhost, other people are not on your network, so they have to connect through you IP. If you give them you real IP address, the should be able to connect.

Note: Firewalls may prevent people from connecting, also if your using a router, its a good idea to forward a port on it.[quote]

i gave them my real IP…not the localhost one…and it wont let me or them connect with it…I turned off firewalls too and it still didnt work :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: A weird IP problem
item.dc:creator: @KeV KeV
item.description:
@KeV wrote:

You can connect to your server because it’s localhost, other people are not on your network, so they have to connect through you IP. If you give them you real IP address, the should be able to connect.

Note: Firewalls may prevent people from connecting, also if your using a router, its a good idea to forward a port on it.

Read full topic
